author: tomo4767
content:
Hello everyone! So `/metrics` for prometheus/grafana have values `validator_correctly_voted_head`, `validator_correctly_voted_source` and `validator_correctly_voted_target` which can be 0 or 1. When I hoover od beaconcha.in value that has been attested it shows rewards in gwei for each head, source and target which is always different value each epoch, even if all of values head/source/target  are correctly voted.

Is there a way, using beacoin API, to:

1. At the begining of epoch, determine which slot attestation duty is set for certain (home) validator?

2. Capture if head/source/target is correctly voted (0 or 1) right after end of slot where validators duty for attestation is set?

3. Calculate/capture reward values for head/source/target at that epoch?

Thnx in advance

author: sproul
content:
does the rewards API not cover your use-case?

<https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/#/Rewards/getAttestationsRewards>

the reason the rewards differ each epoch is because they scale with the participation rate, which moves around a bit

author: sproul
content: the only thing that the rewards API doesn't cover is giving you immediate feedback after the slot where the validator attested, usually you'll have to wait until the end of the _next_ epoch, because that's the point when the rewards are calculated

author: tomo4767
content: Yes it is, i haven't seen that because I used 2.3.0, and didn't saw 2.4.0. Thnx for info and explanation also.
